mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTI_ID , A.BOARD_ID , A.CATE_ID , A.UP_NOTI_ID , A.NOTI_KIND , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTS , A.NOTI_URL , A.NOTI_OPN_DIV , A.FB_REG_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.STAT_CD , B.USER_ID , B.USER_NM , A.NOTI_READ_CNT , A.NOTI_OK_CNT , A.NOTI_NG_CNT , A.WRITE_IP , A.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , A.NOTI_END_DTTM , A.SCRAP_CNT , A.NOTI_OPN_CNT , A.REG_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( A.REG_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS CHAR(19) ) REG_DTTM , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTTM , A.REF , A.RESTEP , A.RELEVEL , B.USER_FILE_NM , B.USER_FILE_PATH , C.APND_FILE_SEQ , C.APND_FILE_ORGN , C.APND_FILE_NM , C.APND_FILE_PATH FROM NOTI_INFO A, PSN_USER B, NOTI_APND_FILE C WHERE A.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.NOTI_ID , A.BOARD_ID , A.CATE_ID , A.UP_NOTI_ID , A.NOTI_KIND , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTS , A.NOTI_URL , A.NOTI_OPN_DIV , A.FB_REG_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.STAT_CD , B.USER_ID , B.USER_NM , A.NOTI_READ_CNT , A.NOTI_OK_CNT , A.NOTI_NG_CNT , A.WRITE_IP , A.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , A.NOTI_END_DTTM , A.SCRAP_CNT , A.NOTI_OPN_CNT , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DTTM , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTTM , A.REF , A.RESTEP , A.RELEVEL , B.USER_FILE_NM , B.USER_FILE_PATH , C.APND_FILE_SEQ , C.APND_FILE_ORGN , C.APND_FILE_NM , C.APND_FILE_PATH , ROUND((NOTI_OK_CNT/(NOTI_OK_CNT+NOTI_NG_CNT))*100) OK_CNT_RATIO , ROUND((NOTI_NG_CNT/(NOTI_OK_CNT+NOTI_NG_CNT))*100) NG_CNT_RATIO FROM NOTI_INFO A, PSN_USER B, NOTI_APND_FILE C WHERE A.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY A.NOTI_READ_CNT DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT C.NOTI_ID ,A.APND_FILE_SEQ ,A.APND_FILE_ORGN ,A.APND_FILE_NM ,A.APND_FILE_PATH ,C.NOTI_TITLE FROM NOTI_APND_FILE A, NOTI_INFO C WHERE A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND A.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY NOTI_OK_CNT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT C.NOTI_ID ,C.NOTI_OK_CNT ,A.APND_FILE_SEQ ,A.APND_FILE_ORGN ,A.APND_FILE_NM ,A.APND_FILE_PATH ,C.NOTI_TITLE FROM NOTI_APND_FILE A, NOTI_INFO C WHERE A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND C.CATE_ID IN (SELECT CATE_ID FROM CATE_INFO WHERE UP_CATE_ID = #{cateId} AND DEL_YN = 'N') AND A.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY NOTI_OK_CNT DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT C.NOTI_ID ,C.NOTI_NG_CNT ,A.APND_FILE_SEQ ,A.APND_FILE_ORGN ,A.APND_FILE_NM ,A.APND_FILE_PATH ,C.NOTI_TITLE FROM NOTI_APND_FILE A, NOTI_INFO C WHERE A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND C.CATE_ID IN (SELECT CATE_ID FROM CATE_INFO WHERE UP_CATE_ID = #{cateId} AND DEL_YN = 'N') AND A.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY NOTI_NG_CNT DESC LIMIT 4
